Name: Double Jump
Description: Allows the player to jump a second time in mid-air.

Name: Wall Climb
Description: Allows the player to climb walls.

Name: Dash
Description: Quickly moves the player in a direction.

Name: Invisibility
Description: Makes the player invisible to enemies for a short time.

Name: Grapple Hook
Description: Allows player to grapple to surfaces.

Name: Super Jump
Description: Increases jump height massively for a single jump.

Name: Time Slow
Description: Slows time for everything but the player.

Name: Shield
Description: Creates a temporary shield that blocks damage.

Name: Teleport
Description: Instantly moves player to a short distance location.
